review: I plugged it into a HDMI in the back of my AV Receiver. Set up was quick. Found my wifi and connected and it updated the Fire Stick right away. Whole set up time was less than 10 minutes. I have Netflix and Prime also. Works great (no lagging) and sounds really good through my AV Receiver. The remote works fine with the stick plugged in the back of the receiver, does NOT have to be line of sight like I have seen on other reviews. Not sure why they would say that.Glad I got it. Anyone can set this up themselves.
author: Gregg "Gregg"

review: The biggest advantage this has over the Chronecast is that this comes with a remote. But I do love it.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Seems to work ok for Amazon Prime, but that service is severely limited in selection, so it is not very useful.  I was hoping to be able to stream similar to chromecast.
author: Jon Dobkin

review: Satisfied with the streaming experience and choice of the channels. The interface is also very slick and the voice search (Android app) is awesome. The only issue was set-up ... the software download stalled many times and no clear instructions or help on Amazon website. Finally, I followed the suggestion on reddit and used the HDMO extender dongle at which point things started working. I am still using the dongle and not directly attaching the stick.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I bought this for my old 720P LCD TV that is not compatible with chromecast and it works!  The setup took about 20 minutes and that included the update. So far so good streaming Amazon video, Netflix and ESPN.  The remote is a nice feature to have.Note: I did the pre-order from prime but couldn't wait till Jan so I got mine at Staples on sale
author: zd

review: Very simple to install.  Much simpler then my Roku setup.
author: sonett

review: It will not work on my Samsung DLP tv, always says unsupported mode, it worked at first when I plugged it in the first time but now nothing. I plugged it in to my smart TV and BAM! Works perfectly,  it updated and everything.  So I thought to myself " hey since it updated here matey it work now in my other tv!" WRONG! Got nothing, same results, I got this for my wife as an early Christmas gift, now I don't know what to do, I don't need it on my smart TV, I got the ps4 and the pay hooked up to it the other TV has nothing. I looked online and didn't find any solutions,  can someone give me a hand??
author: jafcon

review: Amazing. Paired with plex, and it's everything you need.
author: Mike L

review: It's ok. The remote is cheap. Luckily there is an app to replace the remote. It is nice to have 8gb of storage. Other than that it is basically a chromecast. Nothing special. I already own the chromecast so I'm not very impressed.
